sudoku
Class SudokuBoard

java.lang.Object
  sudoku.SudokuBoard

public class SudokuBoard
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the solver methods and has a Collection of Nodes.

solveLogically

public void solveLogically()
It starts solving the puzzle logically. It is a recursive method and continues until it cannot update anything else.
